name: Verify POST /store/order rejects invalid order data with appropriate error codes
description: Validates that API properly rejects invalid order data and returns appropriate HTTP error codes (4xx)
descriptionHtml: Validates that API properly rejects invalid order data and returns appropriate HTTP error codes (4xx)
statusMessage: Critical validation gap detected: API accepted invalid order data for 'Negative pet ID'. Expected 4xx status but got 200. This indicates missing API validation. Response: {"id":1749381525295,"petId":-1,"quantity":1,"complete":false}
statusTrace:
